title: Financial Literacy Seminar
description:
# Financial Literacy Seminar

**Master Your Money, Secure Your Future**

> "Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it." - Robert Kiyosaki

### ðŸ’³ Debt Management

### ðŸŽ¯ Financial Goal Setting

## Expert Speakers

**Dato' Tan Mei Ling**  
*CEO, Malaysian Financial Planning Association*

**Dr. Ahmad Firdaus**

**This seminar is completely FREE for all participants!**
